alert.note: Alert for East Sweetwater County; Flaming Gorge; Rock Springs and Green River; South Lincoln County (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued March 09 at 7:59PM MST by NWS Riverton
info.description: ...Bitterly Cold Tonight... This is a special weather statement from the National Weather Service Office in Riverton. * WHAT...Although winds will become lighter tonight, wind chills are expected to range from 15 below and 25 below zero. * WHERE...Southern Lincoln County and Sweetwater County. * WHEN...Tonight. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Frostbite can occur in as little as 30 minutes at those bitter cold temperatures. The most susceptible parts of the body to frostbite are the extremities such as fingers, toes and the tip of the nose. If you must go outside, try to stay out of the wind, and dress in several layers of loose fitting, lightweight, warm clothing.

area.areaDesc: East Sweetwater County; Flaming Gorge; Rock Springs and Green River; South Lincoln County
